Name: Gravity Magician
About the game: Gravity Magician is a pixel art gravity controlled puzzle game. In Gravity Magician you have to go through a dungeon as a magician who can control the gravity of small objects. Move rocks, turn on ground plates, and avoid traps to advance further in the dungeon. Game Features: 15 levels of levels testing your intelligence, Pretty pixel art, Unusual magic gravity mechanics.
